email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a spot enquiry for 12,000MT of Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the PACIFIC STAR, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the prompt offer. Given our recurring business and the volume we handle, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 41.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 11,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is still 24 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Brisbane on 1st October, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers
